mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.account "account", t.receiveEmail "receiveemail", t.productID "productid", t.productName "productname", t.createdate "createdate", t.notifydate "notifydate", t.status "status" from t_emailnotifyproduct t where 1=1 order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into t_emailnotifyproduct ( id,createdate ,account ,receiveEmail ,productID ,productName ,status ) values ( id,now() ,#{account} ,#{receiveEmail} ,#{productID} ,#{productName} ,#{status} )
mapper.update: update t_emailnotifyproduct set id=#{id} ,account=#{account} ,receiveEmail=#{receiveEmail} ,productID=#{productID} ,productName=#{productName} ,notifydate=#{notifydate} ,status=#{status} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.account "account", t.receiveEmail "receiveemail", t.productID "productid", t.productName "productname", t.createdate "createdate", t.notifydate "notifydate", t.status "status" from t_emailnotifyproduct t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_emailnotifyproduct where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_emailnotifyproduct t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select count(*) from t_emailnotifyproduct t where 1=1 and account=#{account} and productID=#{productID}
